# mFlags

**Instance Property**

A translation flag value.

## Declaration

```swift
var mFlags: AudioBytePacketTranslationFlags
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/audio_file_packet_translation_flags] for supported values.
